# frame()

**Instance Method**

Positions this view within an invisible frame.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func frame() -> some View

```

## Layout modifiers

- **edgesIgnoringSafeArea(_:)**: Changes the view’s proposed area to extend outside the screen’s safe areas.
- **coordinateSpace(name:)**: Assigns a name to the view’s coordinate space, so other code can operate on dimensions like points and sizes relative to the named space.

items.description: Changes the view’s proposed area to extend outside the screen’s safe areas.
items.name: edgesIgnoringSafeArea(_:)

items.description: Assigns a name to the view’s coordinate space, so other code can operate on dimensions like points and sizes relative to the named space.
